name: Massi
description:
Massi is a retro-styled platformer game with souls like features. Massi lost his kingdom and with the help of his friends, he will re-conquer his land.
The game is fast-paced and as you learn new skills, Massi can get more and more freedom to evolve in his kingdom, Numidia. A game for those who like pixel art, retro style games, feel good controls, challenging fights. If after you played Sekiro, all the games you played felt boring because you could not parry attacks, Massi does the job.
